values: 错误的；不恰当的；不适宜的；不合适的；不道德的；不公正的；不正常的；有毛病的；失常的；不合乎事实的；弄错的；坏的
错误地；不恰当地；不适宜地；不公正地；不正当地；不合适地
不公正；不公平；不正义；冤枉；错误；过失；不道德；侵权行为；不正当行为；不义行为
冤枉；不公正地对待；不诚实对待；误解；曲解；委屈

synonym.mean: 错误地；邪恶的，不正当地
错误的；失常的；不适当的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 不正当的；不讲道理的；不合法的
错误地；不恰当地；不公正地
做坏事的人；违法犯罪者

word_group.phrase: the wrong side of the tracks
get off on the wrong foot

word_group.brief_definition: 捕风捉影；把方法搞错(或想偏), 找错目标
word_group.phrase: be barking up the wrong tree
born on the wrong side of the blanket

word_group.brief_definition: 下错了赌注；做错了选择

bilingual.source: When Maria met Paul's mom, she was supposed to greet her the wrong way.
bilingual.target: 当玛丽亚见到保罗的妈妈时，她应该用错误的方式问候她。

bilingual.source: We need to rectify the wrong ideas.
bilingual.target: 我们需要端正错误的观念。
老师把答案标记为错误的。

bilingual.source: The fdp was sent to the wrong address.
bilingual.target: 这个数据包被发送到了错误的地址。
他故意地给了错误的方向。
我不小心按了错误的按钮。

bilingual.source: He believes that lying is morally wrong.
bilingual.target: 他认为撒谎在道德上是错误的。

bilingual.source: John dialed the wrong number by mistake.
bilingual.target: 约翰误拨号了错误的号码。

bilingual.source: The package was sent to the wrong address.
bilingual.target: 包裹被送到了错误的地址。

list.abstract: wrong（英 [rɒŋ]，美 [rɔːŋ]），英语单词，作形容词为不正确的；错误的；不合乎事实的。作副词为不适当地；不适宜地；错误地。作名词为不公正；不公平；不道德。短语搭配有what is wrong with（...出什么问题了）。例句为“He ended up in the wrong place.（结果他去错了地方。）” wrong副词类近义词有in error、incorrectly等，相关反义词有right、rightfulness等。

yingyinNormal.en: Say again? Look, look... Greenspan's wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再说一遍？听着，格林斯潘是错误的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, they shouldn't have. My calculations were wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是，但他们本不该发现的，我的计算是错误的。

yingyinNormal.en: So, no thrust? As you testified, it was completely destroyed. The ACARS data was wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就是没推力？就如你证词所言，发动机彻底损毁，飞机通信寻址与报告系统的数据是错误的。

yingyinNormal.en: And that is the answer to the question, what is wrong with eating at The Cheesecake Factory?
yingyinNormal.zh: 她刚才回答之前的那问题了，为什么来芝士蛋糕工厂吃饭是错误的选择。

yingyinNormal.en: Though I had been right much more than I had been wrong, I let one bad bet erase all my good ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然我正确的次数比错误多，一个错误的赌注却抹杀了一切。

yingyinNormal.en: That's wrong and we have to choose policies that ensure pregnant workers are treated with dignity and respect.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是错误的，我们必须选择这样的政策，确保能够给予怀孕的员工尊严与尊重。

yingyinNormal.en: Love it! I know! Yeah. I think there's a chance I might've been living life all wrong. And I think, maybe you've been right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好爱哦！我懂的。我觉得一直以来我的人生可能都是以错误的方式在过，我觉得或许你是对的。

yingyinNormal.en: But that's beside the point. There is an American on board. And you believe that? Well, you wouldn't want to make the wrong call.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这不是重点。关键是船上有个美国人。你相信吗？你可不想做出错误的决定。

yingyinNormal.en: A world-class telecommunications company. Bigger than ever. Perfectly positioned to make some wrong things right. Hence, this meeting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 世界一流的电信公司。规模前所未有得庞大。我们致力于将错误的事情纠正。因此有了这场会面。

yingyinNormal.en: All you need to do is let go of your attachment to having the right answers yourself, and use your fear of being wrong to become open-minded to these other views.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要做的只是放下自己非要正确的需要，用你对错误的恐惧对他人观点保持开放态度。

yingyinNormal.en: Undoubtedly another snide response to my repeated letters complaining that the flags in front of the courthouse are flying in the wrong order. From left to right, it's supposed to be federal, state, and then city of Pasadena.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肯定又是回信来鄙视我之前寄去的几封信里投诉了法院门口的旗子次序是错误的，按照从左到右的顺序 应该先是联邦旗，州旗，最后才轮到帕萨迪纳市旗。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, you're wrong. Okay, you're wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看错了，你错了。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe my ruler's wrong. Maybe all the rulers are wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可能是量尺有问题。可能所有的量尺都有问题。

yingyinNormal.en: How could I be so wrong?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我怎么会错得这么离谱？

yingyinNormal.en: Did it do something wrong?
yingyinNormal.zh: 它做什么错事了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Go wrong ? You killed her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 出故障？是你杀了她。

yingyinNormal.en: You're after the wrong guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你抓错人了。

yingyinNormal.en: The fuck's wrong with them?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些人都他妈怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: No, this is wrong, let's go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是不对的，我们还是走吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Dude, what is wrong with you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 老兄，你是有什么毛病啊？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不法勾当；不诚实行为
adv. 错误地；不道德地；不公正地

word_family.mean: adj. 不正确的；错误的；不合乎事实的；出错的；坏的；不合适的；不适当的；不道德的；弄错的；不正常的

examination_example.sentence: On the other hand, putting your faith in the <highlight>wrong</highlight> place often carries a high price.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，把你的信仰放在错误的地方往往会付出很高的代价。

examination_example.sentence: It has been available even in the most mundane of life situations to show you right from <highlight>wrong</highlight>, good from bad, friend from foe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使在最平凡的生活中，它也能让你明辨是非，明辨善恶，明辨敌我。

examination_example.sentence: He was not interested in daily politics, but concerned with questions of moral behavior and the larger questions of right and <highlight>wrong</highlight> affecting the entire society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他对日常政治不感兴趣，但关注道德行为问题以及影响整个社会的更大的是非问题。

examination_example.sentence: Suppose you have found something <highlight>wrong</highlight> with the electronic dictionary that you bought from an online store the other day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假设你发现某天从网上商店买的电子词典有问题。

sense_info_list.en: an unjust, dishonest, or immoral action

word_usage.usage: wrong作形容词时，通常无比较级和最高级。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不法勾当；不诚实行为
adv. 错误地；不道德地；不公正地

word_family.mean: adj. 不正确的；错误的；不合乎事实的；出错的；坏的；不合适的；不适当的；不道德的；弄错的；不正常的

sense_info_list.en: something (as an idea, rule, or action) that is not right

examination_example.sentence: It is simply <highlight>wrong</highlight> and unfair that most children have a fraction of the access to choirs, orchestras, art studios and drama.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数孩子很少有机会参加合唱团、管弦乐队、艺术工作室和戏剧演出，这是完全错误和不公平的。

examination_example.sentence: While there's an undoubted genetic basis to individual difference, it is <highlight>wrong</highlight> to think that socially defined groups can be genetically accounted for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然就个体差异有着毋庸置疑的基因基础，但认为社会界定的群体可以从基因上解释是错误的。

examination_example.sentence: Your brain just knows there's something <highlight>wrong</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的大脑知道出了错误。

word_usage.usage:
“某人做某事是错的”用it is/was wrong of sb. to do sth.，这里的介词不能替换成for。
示例：你说谎是不正确的。
误 It's wrong for you to tell a lie.
正 It's wrong of you to tell a lie.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不法勾当；不诚实行为

word_family.mean: adj. 不正确的；错误的；不合乎事实的；出错的；坏的；不合适的；不适当的；不道德的；弄错的；不正常的

sense_info_list.en: something (as an idea; rule; or action) that is not right

examination_example.sentence: He ended up in the <highlight>wrong</highlight> place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结果他去错了地方。

examination_example.sentence: A research group has found that Americans who are struggling are thought to be lazy and to have made the <highlight>wrong</highlight> decisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个研究小组发现，正在奋斗的美国人被认为是懒惰的，做出了错误的决定。

examination_example.sentence: They're convinced that whatever decision they make will be the <highlight>wrong</highlight> one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们坚信自己做出的任何决定都是错误的。

examination_example.sentence: But back then, if you were a consultant or freelancer (自由职业者) , people would wonder what was <highlight>wrong</highlight> with you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在当时，如果你是一名顾问或自由职业者，人们会好奇你怎么了。

examination_example.sentence: If anything is really <highlight>wrong</highlight>, you can just take photographs of the damage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果真的出了什么问题，你可以拍下损坏处的照片。

examination_example.sentence: Yes, we haven't noticed anything else <highlight>wrong</highlight> or missing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是的，我们没有发现任何其他错误或遗漏。

word_usage.usage:
“某人做某事是错的”用it is/was wrong of sb. to do sth.，这里的介词不能替换成for。
示例：你说谎是不正确的。
误 It's wrong for you to tell a lie.
正 It's wrong of you to tell a lie.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 做坏事的人；违法犯罪者；作恶者

word_family.mean: adj. 不正确的；错误的；不合乎事实的；出错的；坏的；不合适的；不适当的；不道德的；弄错的；不正常的

sense_info_list.en: something (as an idea, rule, or action) that is not right

examination_example.sentence: But like all performances, there are moments when things go <highlight>wrong</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是像所有的表演一样，总有出错的时候。

examination_example.sentence: Do you know what's <highlight>wrong</highlight> with the car?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你知道这辆车有什么问题吗？

examination_example.sentence: When most of us get a text message on our cell phone from an unknown person, we usually say "sorry, <highlight>wrong</highlight> number!".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们的手机收到陌生人发来的短信时，我们通常会说“抱歉哦，搞错了！”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不合适的; 不合意的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 错误地；不道德地；不公正地

word_family.mean: adj. 不正确的；错误的；不合乎事实的；出错的；坏的；不合适的；不适当的；不道德的；弄错的；不正常的

examination_example.sentence: It's <highlight>wrong</highlight> and dangerous to leave children under a certain age alone in the house.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把不满一定年龄的孩子单独留在家里是错误的，也是危险的。

examination_example.sentence: At that time, I knew I made a <highlight>wrong</highlight> decision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那时，我知道我做了一个错误的决定。

examination_example.sentence: I did something <highlight>wrong</highlight> today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我今天做错了事。

examination_example.sentence: There was something <highlight>wrong</highlight> with my car，so I went to work by underground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的车出了点问题，所以我坐地铁去上班了。

examination_example.sentence: What's <highlight>wrong</highlight> with you?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你怎么了？

examination_example.sentence: There was something <highlight>wrong</highlight> with his head.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的头出了问题。

sense_info_list.zh: 不合适的; 不合意的

examination_example.sentence: Why was Pepper asked to lay the napkin at the <highlight>wrong</highlight> place?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么派珀被要求把餐巾放在不合适的地方？

word_usage.usage:
“某人做某事是错的”用it is/was wrong of sb. to do sth.，这里的介词不能替换成for。
示例：你说谎是不正确的。
误 It's wrong for you to tell a lie.
正 It's wrong of you to tell a lie.
